com.aionemu.commons.network
Interface ConnectionFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
AionConnectionFactoryImpl, GameConnectionFactoryImpl, GsConnectionFactoryImpl, LoginConnectionFactoryImpl
public interface ConnectionFactory

This interface defines a factory for connection implementations.
It is used by the class Acceptor to create actual connection implementations.

Author:
-Nemesiss-
See Also:
Acceptor

                   Dispatcher dispatcher)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Create a new AConnection instance.
